Name: Triphala Powder
Description: Triphala powder is a combination of three fruits, known for its detoxifying and digestive benefits.
Uses: Supports digestion, promotes detoxification, and aids in weight management.
Doses: 1 teaspoon in warm water daily or as directed by a healthcare professional.

Name: Ashwagandha Powder
Description: Ashwagandha powder is an ancient adaptogenic herb that helps manage stress and boosts energy.
Uses: Helps reduce stress and anxiety, improves energy levels, and supports brain function.
Doses: 1 teaspoon mixed with water or milk daily or as advised by an Ayurvedic practitioner.

Name: Amla Powder
Description: Amla powder is rich in vitamin C and antioxidants, promoting immune support and healthy skin.
Uses: Boosts immunity, supports healthy skin and hair, and aids digestion.
Doses: 1 teaspoon in water or juice daily or as recommended by a healthcare provider.

Name: Moringa Powder
Description: Moringa powder is a nutrient-rich superfood known for its energy-boosting and anti-inflammatory properties.
Uses: Supports overall health, provides essential nutrients, and helps reduce inflammation.
Doses: 1 teaspoon in water, smoothies, or food daily or as directed by a nutritionist.
